definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 70] offspring, young of beasts ([[שגר]] id. Sir 40:19; cf. We:Skizzen iii. 170);—cstr. ´[[שׁ]]:;—[[בְּהֵמָה]] ´[[כָּל־פֶּטֶר שׁ]]: Ex 13:12 (J; [[רֶחֶם]] ´[[כָּל־ט]]: precedes); also [[שְׁגַר אֲלָפֶיךָ]] De 7:13, De 28:4, De 28:18, De 28:51 (all ‖[[עַשְׁתְּרׂת חאׁנֶ֑ךָ ]]).
